name: Bouncy Bouncing Shuriken Ball - by Cobalt Play Games
name_original: Bouncy Bouncing Shuriken Ball - by Cobalt Play Games
description:
DOWNLOAD IT TODAY FOR FREE - Bouncy Bouncing Shuriken Ball

Save your bouncing red ball friends and block the ninja assassin shuriken stars. Tap above each of the red ball to spawn the spikes just before the shuriken kills them. You have 5 lives. Tap like crazy in this addictive, simple game.

FEATURES
- Super addictive and simple game play.
- Save your top score.
- Great NES / SNES style graphics.
- Cute 8 bit style music.

WHAT PLAYERS ARE SAYING
- "I love the lil red ball blinks and animations, very cute, makes me wanna protect them, lol" - Royle Ninja - Feb 2 2014

- "A lot easier than their other games for sure. i like it. the spikes should snap vertically above the red balls though, easier to block the stars" - Tim Cox - Feb 2 2014

Show your support by rating Bouncy Bouncing Shuriken Ball.
